description.narrative: The project development objectives is to strengthen the effectiveness and efficiency of the Government of Macedonia's (GoM)socialsa fety net through (a) the introduction of conditional cash transfers; and (b) improvements in the administration,oversight,monitorin g, and evaluation of social assistance transfers. The project would contribute to the GoM's ultimateobjectives ofalleviating curr ent poverty and enhancing human capital, thereby reducing the inter-generational transmission ofpoverty over thelong-run.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :L.A, Schedule 2, Section I.C | Description :prepare and submit to the WB for review and approval, annual workprograms and budgets prepared by the PMU with inputs from CCTIU | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :L.A, Schedule 2, Section II.A.1 | Description :monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepareProject Reports in accordance with the provisions agreed with the WB | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1 | Description :maintainance of the CCT Council, the CCT Working Group, the CCTIU,the PMU and the SWCs, all with a composition, staff, resources an d terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.2 | Description :carry out the Project in accordance with the POM, the MEPO and theManual for CCT Program Grants, and change it only with prior writ ten approval of the WB | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.3 | Description :ensure that CCT grants are provided to beneficiaries in line withrequirements and procedures set forth in Manual for CCT Grants | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.4 | Description :appoint one expert in each of its territorial SWC to work full timeon the CCT program implementation | Frequency :Quarterly
Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section II.B.2 | Description :prepare and furnish to the Bank interim unaudited financialreports for the Project covering the quarter | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :LA, Schedule 2, Section II.B.3 | Description :have its Financial Statements audited in accordance with theprovisions of Section 5.09 (b) of the General Conditions | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :LA. Schedule 2, Section II.B.1 | Description :maintain a financial management system in accordance with theprovisions of Section 5.09 of the General Conditions | Frequency :Quarterly

title.narrative: Processing time per SFA applications reduced
Cash benefit programs administered in the MIS
CCTIU staffed and 1 staff member in each SWC assigned to CCT program
% of SFA beneficiary children aged 15-18 that have been registered with CCT
Enrollment rates of children ages 15-18 in CCT beneficiary households
Impact evaluation for education CCT program
Administration of Safety Nets strengthened, especially with the use of MIS
Assessment of targeting mechanisms, eligibility, and registry systems of different CBs completed.
Number of MLSP and SWC staff trained
Education conditionalities are monitored in MIS
Time frame SWCs answer to CCT complaints
At least 85 % attendance rates of children ages 15-18 in CCT beneficiary households
